text: Edwin Coratti (born 19 June 1991) is an Italian snowboarder. He competed in the 2013 and 2015 FIS Snowboard World Championships, and in the 2018 Winter Olympics, in parallel giant slalom. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1991 births Category:Living people Category:Italian male snowboarders Category:Olympic snowboarders of Italy Category:Snowboarders at the 2018 Winter Olympics Category:Snowboarders of Fiamme Oro
title: Edwin Coratti
